title: 求推荐一个中配光影
author: lockedcc
txt_content:
显卡是RTX2060，CPU是I5-9400F 2.90GHz
如果想60帧运行游戏大概能到什么光影？

replies.author: 石叶尾猫
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ppo325 于 2019-12-29 20:44 编辑 

用了很久 中配fps50-60  效果很棒 https://share.weiyun.com/52wfBHL

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
（我觉得 ptgi 都没啥问题，但是我又不能给你）

试试 bsl ，虽然搬运者说是低配，实际不是
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=882620

还有这个
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=694322

replies.author: 无敌枪神555
replies.txt_content:
推荐这两个，Acc是SEUS的改进，用过都说好







AccE11SeUs 1.0.zip

BSL Standard v7.0p1.zip
